name: GOOGLE_NEWS__GET_TOP_HEADLINES
description: Fetches the top news headlines for a specific country and language.

country.description: The two-letter ISO 3166-1 code for the country (e.g., 'PK' for Pakistan, 'US' for USA). Defaults to 'PK'.

lang.description: The two-letter ISO 639-1 code for the language (e.g., 'en' for English, 'ur' for Urdu). Defaults to 'en'.

name: GOOGLE_NEWS__SEARCH_TOPIC
description: Searches for news articles related to a specific topic within a given time frame, country, and language.

query.description: The search term or topic (e.g., 'artificial intelligence').

period.description: The time frame to search within (e.g., '7d' for 7 days, '1m' for 1 month, '1y' for 1 year). Defaults to '7d'.

country.description: The two-letter ISO 3166-1 code for the country to search in (e.g., 'PK', 'US'). Defaults to 'US'.

lang.description: The two-letter ISO 639-1 code for the language (e.g., 'en', 'ur'). Defaults to 'en'.
